Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for light maps.

degRotX_0.Wiki: The horizontal angle to use for this light source. In degrees.

degRotY_0.Wiki: The vertical angle to use for this light source. In degrees.

colR_0.Wiki: The red component of the RGBA color used for this light source.

colG_0.Wiki: The green component of the RGBA color used for this light source.

colB_0.Wiki: The blue component of the RGBA color used for this light source.

colA_0.Wiki: The alpha component of the RGBA color used for this light source.

degRotX_1.Wiki: The horizontal angle to use for this light source. In degrees.

degRotY_1.Wiki: The vertical angle to use for this light source. In degrees.

colR_1.Wiki: The red component of the RGBA color used for this light source.

colB_1.Wiki: The blue component of the RGBA color used for this light source.

colA_1.Wiki: The alpha component of the RGBA color used for this light source.
